articles.content:

articles.title: 'Make sure I wake up. I have a daughter.' After 2 months unconscious, Inglewood COVID-19 survivor reunited with family - KABC-TV
articles.description: Cheers echoed through Centinela Hospital in Inglewood as COVID-19 survivor Michael Orantes was reunited with his family after months in the hospital.
